~Bear Fortitude~.Effect:
The Bear gains Shielding equal to 3 + (Your Level).
Lasts up to 1 hour.
~Bear Fortitude~.Notes: For Druids, the Shielding disappears if Shapeshift is cancelled.

~Maul~.Effect:
The target must pass a Might Check or take 1d4 Damage (1d10 if Shapeshift) and be Stunned.
Takes half of the damage if it passes.

~Swiping Claw~.Effect: All creatures around the Bear take directly 3 Slash Damage (6 Damage if Druid).

~Prowl~.Effect:
The first attack of the Large Cat in a combat ignores the target's Defense.
The Cat and it's owner leave no tracks.
The Cat and it's owner have Proficiency in Stealth (see Proficiencies).

~Rake~.Effect:
A target must pass a Dexterity Check or take 1d8 Damage (3d6 for Shapeshift) and be Crippled.
Takes half of the damage if it passes.
Does not work on creatures that can't bleed.

~Talons~.Effect:
Bird of Prey melee attacks have 2 meters range.
An enemy starting its turn near the Bird of Prey is slowed by 50%.

~Beak Poke~.Effect:
A creature near the Bird of Prey must pass a Dexterity Check or take 2d4 Pierce Damage (2d8 + 1 for Shapeshift) and be Blinded.
Takes half of the damage if it passes.

~Ferocity~.Effect: Critical Strike - If you rolled 6 on the Wolf's base attack, deal another 1d6 Damage.

~Leap~.Range: Exactly 3 meters range, no more, no less.
~Leap~.Effect:
The Wolf leaps at a target (near it).
The target rolls a Dexterity Check.
If it fails, the target is Knocked Prone.

~Elk Flank~.Effect: The Elk's first Flank attack every turn deals 1 extra damage.

~Rideable Steed~.Effect: You (or an ally) can ride your Elk as if you were Trained in riding. The Elk's speed is 8 when not in combat.

~Majestic Buffet~.Effect:
Use this after you used Pet Attack.
The same target makes a Charisma Check.
If it fails, it is Charmed (by the pet).
~Majestic Buffet~.Notes: If you are a Druid, use this after you performed a melee attack.

~Poison Fangs~.Effect: Giant Spider attacks deal +1d6 extra Poison Damage to targets affected by Crowd Control (except Slows).

~Web~.Effect: A target must pass a Dexterity Check or be Snared.

~Stampede~.Effect: If the Gorilla moves in a straight line at least 3 meters and then attacks, the attack deals +1d4 damage and the target must succeed a Might Check or be knocked Prone.

~Fling Over~.Effect:
A Unit near the Gorilla must pass a Might Check or take 1d6 Smash Damage and be thrown up to 3 meters in any direction,
If it collides with another Unit or an obstacle/wall, they both take an extra 1d6 Smash Damage.

~Spikes~.Effect: After a Unit makes a melee attack on the Porcupine, it takes 1d4 Pierce Damage.

~Quillshot~.Effect: All Units within 3 meters of the Porcupine are attacked with arrow-like quills and take 2d6 + 2 Pierce damage (against Defense).

~Humanoid Clarity~.Effect: You can cast Spells while Shapeshifted into a Lycanthrope.

~Howl~.Effect:
Choose between Silence and Cripple.
All enemies within 5 meters must pass a Wisdom Check or be Silenced or Crippled, whichever you chose.

~Branch Blow~.Effect:
Attack a target for 2d6 Smash damage.
If you roll at least one 6, the target must pass a Dexterity Check or be Snared.

~Poisoning Bite~.Effect:
Bite a target for 1d8 Poison damage (against Defense).
At the start of your (Druid's) next turn, the target takes another 1d6 Poison damage directly.
~Poisoning Bite~.Notes: This is considered an attack, of course.

~Spike Shoot~.Effect: Attack a target for 2d4 + 1 Pierce damage.

Golem.Description:
A golem is an artificial life form created from a durable material.
When creating the golem, choose the material - clay, metal, flesh.
A golem's size is Large.
It has different abilities based on its material.

~Attack~.Effect: Deals 1d8 + Your Highest Stat Smash damage.

~Clay - Earth Rumble~.Effect: All enemies within 4 meters of the Golem take 8 Shock damage and become Slowed.

~Metal - Iron Curtain~.Effect: The Golem provides Cover to all allies within 1 meter of it.

~Flesh - Incite Fear~.Effect:
All enemies within 4 meters of the Golem must pass a Wisdom Check or be Feared by the Golem and take 1d8 + 4 Necrotic damage.
If they pass, they take half of that damage.

Dragon Wyrm.Description:
This small to medium sized dragon has a color and an element specific to it (Fire/Cold/Shock/Acid/Poison).
That element is called the Dragon Wyrm Element.

~Element Resistance~.Effect:
The Dragon Wyrm's attacks have 3 meters range and the damage type is the Dragon Wyrm's element.
You and your pet take only 50% Damage from the Dragon Wyrm Element.
If you're a Druid, you must choose an element when Shapeshifting.

~Dragon Breath~.Effect:
The pet breathes its Dragon Wyrm Element in a 3x1 meter line.
Targets roll a Grade 12 Dexterity Check.
They take 2d6 damage (4d6 if Druid) if they fail, and half of that if they succeed.

Owlbolg.Description: An Owlbolg is an ape-like owl creature with an innate spell casting talent.

~Owl Bolt~.Effect:
Owlbolg's Attacks have 10 meters range and shoot a magical missile that deals Force damage.
Owlbolgs can use Scrolls and Potions for 1 Action.
~Owl Bolt~.Notes: Refers to Pet Attack or Animal Attack.

~Quicken Spell~.Effect: The Owlbolg casts a Spell you know that takes Half-Action.
~Quicken Spell~.Notes: If the Spell has a Cooldown, it goes on Cooldown. If it costs something to cast it, you must still spend that cost.

~Druid Spellcasting~.Effect: As a Druid, while Shapeshifted into an Owlbolg, you can cast Spells.

~Roaring Thunder~.Effect:
The target must pass a Wisdom Check or take 1d6 Shock Damage and be Feared.
Takes half of the damage if it passes.

~Swiping Claw~.Effect: All creatures within 1 meter of the Spirit Bear take directly 3 Slash Damage.

~Talons~.Effect: An enemy starting its turn near the Bird of Prey is slowed by 50%.

~Beak Poke~.Effect:
A creature near the Spirit Eagle must pass a Dexterity Check or take 2d4 Pierce Damage and be Blinded.
Takes half of the damage if it passes.

~Ferocity~.Effect: Pet attack deals 1d8 instead of 1d6 damage and the damage type becomes Fire.

~Leap~.Range: Exactly 3 meters range, no more, no less.
~Leap~.Effect:
The Wolf leaps at a target (near it).
The target rolls a Dexterity Check.
If it fails, the target is Knocked Prone.

~Silent Flight~.Effect: You and your Owl have Proficiency in Stealth.

~Spirit Attacks~.Effect: Owl Pet Attack deals Psychic damage.

~Shriek~.Effect: A Unit within 6 meters of the Owl must pass a Wisdom Check or be Silenced.

~Elemental Resistance~.Effect: Takes only 50% damage from its chosen element (rounded down) (after Defense).

~Little Helper~.Effect: Can freely use Potions for you or your allies, but not scrolls.

~Chase Bolt~.Effect:
Attack a target for 1d4 Shock damage (against Defense).
All upcoming Chase Bolts (from any Dual-Imp) on the target deal +1 damage.
~Chase Bolt~.Notes: The first Chase Bolt deals 1d4; the next one 1d4 + 1; the next one 1d4 + 2; The 66th one deals 1d4 + 65.

~Cleaving Blow~.Effect: Attack all Units in one half of the Avatar's vicinity (and within 1 meter) for 2d6 + Your Highest Stat Damage (Force, Smash or Slash, your choice).
~Cleaving Blow~.Notes: Half of vicinity means the shape of a "]" or a semicircle.

~Draw In~.Effect:
Use when an Enemy comes within its Melee range of an Ally (or yourself) (usually 1 meter).
It must pass a Might Check or be pulled 3 meters towards the Patron Avatar and take 1d10 Force damage.
If takes half of that if it passes.

~Spirit Unrest~.Effect: All spaces within 1 meter of the Avatar count as Hard Terrain.
